reviewText: The video you will see is not enough to really learn the auto detailing it's giving you the basic which every body know

I know this is only $30 but the level of quality is so poor. They really should have hired a professional to make this DVD. The spend too much time on the DVD actually detailing the car and they don't explain what they're doing. You can quickly show me how to vacuum, but I don't need to watch you doing it for 20 minutes.

I would not buy this DVD
